subject: Ali express order
description_text:
Hi i placed an order for pedals via ali expreaa, thw pedals did not come with the pedal heel plate, can you confirm if this was supposed to be included please?


Odder id : 3057146579374666

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi Richard Pugh,   I’ve checked your order, and it does not include the base plate and heel rest. If you need them, you can purchase them separately.
